questions.question: What would you recommend from the menu?
What is your favorite pizza topping on the menu?
questions.answer: I recommend todays' special for just $7.50. It's our chef's choice which is margherita pizza and house salad.

questions.question: How about I look at the menu once more?
Which beer do you recommend?
questions.answer: I do not drink alcohol, but I heard pilsner beer is delicious.

questions.question: Okay I will order a pilsner!
Can I get appetizers first and then the main course meal?
For appetizers, can I get deep fried calamari and battered fried shrimp? Please
questions.answer: Sure thing! Appetizer coming right up!

questions.question: For the main course, can I get cheeseburger with onion rings and extra freedom fries?

questions.answer: I would recommend red wine which is red and dry.

questions.question: Which dessert is the cheapest?
questions.answer: The cheapest would be chocolate pudding.
